id: How SpotMini and Atlas Became the Internet's Favorite Robots
paragraph:
Subscribe to 'WIRED'
                  on YouTube to keep up with all of
                  our latest videos and shows.
                Boston Dynamics CEO Marc Raibert shares the backstory of his company's viral videos and how the internet's favorite robot dog, SpotMini, came to be.© 2018 Condé Nast. All rights reserved.
